Title: Nigeria’s US crude oil imports rise to 42m barrels in 10 months
Summary: Nigeria’s US crude oil imports rise to 42m barrels in 10 months . This indicates an increase of about 167 percent year-on-year, due mainly to the efforts of the Dangote Petroleum Refinery .

Title: AFCON 2025 awards: Full list of winners
Summary: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) came to a dramatic close with Senegal crowned champions after a thrilling final against hosts Morocco in Rabat . The 2025 AFCON 2025 awards: Full list of winners .

Title: EFCC beyond 57 properties linked to Malami
Summary: The Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, has been busy since 2023 exposing alleged monumental fraud by top government officials . The latest was the alleged interim forfeiture of 57 properties linked to Abubakar Malami, SAN .

Title: Pound to Naira exchange rate today, January 19, 2026
Summary: Data from both the official Nigerian Foreign Exchange Market (NFEM) and the informal parallel market indicate a persistent gap between regulated and open-market rates .

Title: 52 suspects arrested in Ekpoma for looting, vandalism — IGP
Summary: The Inspector General of Police, IGP, Kayode Egbetokun, has dismissed claims that police officers arrested peaceful protesters in Ekpoma, Edo State . 52 suspects were arrested for looting, vandalism, according to the IGP .

Title: Morning Recap: APC rules out automatic tickets, Makinde dragged to EFCC, Senegal sweep AFCON awards
Summary: The All Progressives Congress has dismissed claims that defectors will be granted automatic tickets for the 2027 general elections . The decision comes amid a wave of high-profile defections, including rumours surrounding Governor Agbu Kefas of Taraba and others, who were reportedly seeking guarantees before switching camps . Title: FULL LIST: AFCON 2025 award winners
Summary: Senegal crowned champions of the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations on Sunday night after defeating hosts Morocco 1–0 after extra time in the final played in Rabat . The decisive goal was scored by Pape Gueye in the 94th minute after a tense contest that ended goalless in regulation time . Sadio Mané was named Player

Title: NYSC releases deployment details for Batch A prospective corps members
Summary: The National Youth Service Corps has released the deployment details for its 2026 Batch A Stream 1 prospective corps members . The scheme announced this on Monday via its official X handle, confirming that call-up letters are now available . The development follows earlier reports by PUNCH Online, in which the scheme explained that camp capacity limitations informed the decision

Title: Morocco fans stunned, disappointed as Senegal win Africa title
Summary: Senegal beat Morocco 1-0 in Africa Cup of Nations final in extra-time thriller in Rabat . Morocco fans walked out of the Prince Moulay Abdellah Stadium in the capital Rabat in utmost despair . Title: Kebbi man arrested for allegedly killing wife
Summary: The Kebbi State Police Command has arrested Sule Gurmu, the man accused of killing his wife, Umaima Maidawa . Incident occurred on January 13, 2026, when Gurmu reportedly struck his 25-year-old wife with the wooden handle of a hoe during a domestic dispute at their residence in Bayawa
